channel.title: Looking for new laptop
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section I was torn between putting it in the General Questions or General Discussion. (Move it to appropriate place <3)
Anyways, I'm looking at buying a new laptop (for myself, mainly gaming)
I play games like League of Legends and Runescape. (Yes. Still.)
I'm looking for some specific benefits such as
[ul][li]Windows 7[/li] [li]4 GB RAM[/li] [li]Atleast 400 GB Memory[/li][/ul]
I'm looking for PC laptops and my price range is about 350$ Min, and a 500$ max (can be changed to like 520$ etc etc. depends on if amazing laptop)
I prefer best buy, not Quibids or any of that shit.
So heres a link to the PC laptops: http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Laptop-Computers/PC+Laptops/pcmcat247400050000.c?id=pcmcat247400050000
You can remove mods if you find it "malicious" lol

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:9, topic:429951”]Not really a laptop but oh well

http://www.commodoreusa.net/CUSA_C64.aspx

Opposite of apple which houses everything in the screen.[/quote]

FUCK YES!

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:18, topic:429951”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=532633.msg3893056#msg3893056 date=1327072632]
Sorry if this is the wrong section I was torn between putting it in the General Questions or General Discussion. (Move it to appropriate place <3)

Anyways, I’m looking at buying a new laptop (for myself, mainly gaming)

I play games like League of Legends and Runescape. (Yes. Still.)

I’m looking for some specific benefits such as

[ul][li]Windows 7[/li]
[li]4 GB RAM[/li]
[li]Atleast 400 GB Memory[/li][/ul]

I’m looking for PC laptops and my price range is about 350$ Min, and a 500$ max (can be changed to like 520$ etc etc. depends on if amazing laptop)

I prefer best buy, not Quibids or any of that shit.

So heres a link to the PC laptops:
http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Laptop-Computers/PC+Laptops/pcmcat247400050000.c?id=pcmcat247400050000

You can remove mods if you find it “malicious” lol
[/quote]
400GB memory 0.o… that is a lot
CPU = memory
you mean 4.00GHz?
and if you meant hard disk 400GB
here is a good one: http://www.costco.com/Browse/Product.aspx?whse=BC&topnav=&prodid=11683689&ec=BC-EC877-CatHome&pos=8&lang=en-US price isn’t bad at all tho only i5 processor
o-o heres a very good one less than 500$
http://www.costco.com/Browse/Product.aspx?Prodid=11747169&whse=BC&Ne=4000000&eCat=BC|84|56670|78129&N=4047232&Mo=32&pos=0&No=2&Nr=P_CatalogName:BC&cat=78129&Ns=P_Price|0||P_SignDesc1&lang=en-US&Sp=C&ec=BC-EC10590-Cat56670&topnav=[/quote]
Both integrated graphics, therefore suck. Particularly with the HP one, a lot of that price is towards the beats branding.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:15, topic:429951”]That’s a load of bull, game performance will be exactly the same, if not better on 7 because of updated drivers and additional core functionality.

A few games are coming out now that don’t even support XP anymore, so getting 7 is definitely the better option.[/quote]@ statement #2 correct but several of the companies are still allowing patches to make it compatible.

@ statement #1 totally disagree. I have used Windows 7 on four different desktops/laptops before. XP will always be better. I am a semi-tech type of guy. I can get my windows xp down to running around 19 processes at any one time. (which is pretty good if I can say) while with Windows 7 I can get the processes down to about 35-38 depending on what’s running. While Windows 7 does have several performance upgrades it just doesn’t match up evenly. The reason why people claim that Windows 7 is better because they have so much RAM. However, with 4gb that still isn’t that much especially for the games out today. xp4life

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:15, topic:429951”]That’s a load of bull, game performance will be exactly the same, if not better on 7 because of updated drivers and additional core functionality.

A few games are coming out now that don’t even support XP anymore, so getting 7 is definitely the better option.[/quote]
My current laptop (vistas) is pure shit.

Its a gateway with single core processor, barley 2 Gigs of Ram, and maybe 200 Gigs of Hard Drive Space, then again I got it for 50$.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

That’s a load of bull, game performance will be exactly the same, if not better on 7 because of updated drivers and additional core functionality.

A few games are coming out now that don’t even support XP anymore, so getting 7 is definitely the better option.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Loveandpower:

if your wanting 4gb of ram and play some hardcore gaming I don’t suggest windows 7…use windows xp.

I have windows XP on this PC (on currently) It’s a pretty bad P.C though, its only the HP pavilion f1703 :’(.

I’ve done some research for quite a while now and I tend to see that I would like Windows 7 much more than xp. I’ve talked to my brother (a windows 7 user, also a game fanatic) what if he recommends windows 7 for LoL (League of Legends, we both play) and he said he likes it but its personal preference, Windows 7 Will make it run just a tad bit slower.

Also, What I’ve noticed about Windows xp/7 is that Most laptops don’t support XP anymore, XP is out-dated and it doesn’t look as neat

Thanks for your input though <3

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Loveandpower:

if your wanting 4gb of ram and play some hardcore gaming I don’t suggest windows 7…use windows xp.

Most newer laptops get blue screened with windows xp because windows xp is no longer supported by micosoft other then security updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for new laptop
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:6, topic:429951”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=532633.msg3893073#msg3893073 date=1327073366]

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/HP+-+Refurbished+Pavilion+Laptop+-+Dark+Umber/4708288.p?id=1218512777057&skuId=4708288

Not a bad machine there, that thing can play cod4 on medium settings, definitely good value for money.

  • Quad core AMD processor @ 2.4ghz with turbo boost.
  • 6GB RAM expandable to 16GB
  • 640GB HDD
  • AMD Radeon HD 6520G dedicated graphics

All for $439.99

You seem like you know it personally What kind of Frame Rate does it have

I’m a hardware geek, particularly with laptops

Call of Duty Modern Warfare:
Low settings avg @ 97fps
Medium settings @ 45fps~

Notebookcheck

AMD Radeon HD 6520G

Specifications and benchmarks of the AMD Radeon HD 6520G graphics card for notebooks.


List of benchmarks for common games.
[/quote]
Oh snappp. Thats my baby right there. lolol. I hope it can run League of Legends fine I’m sure it can <3

Thanks hoe. ;)[/quote]
haha np bby <3

Read full topic
